analysis.description:
StandardBounties.transferredAmountEqualsValue (/unique_chucks/2/0x2af47a65da8cd66729b4209c22017d6a5c2d2400.sol#230-251) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)((tokenContracts[_bountyId].balanceOf(this) - oldBalance) == _amount)
	- require(bool)((tokenContracts[_bountyId].balanceOf(this) - oldBalance) == _amount)

Reentrancy in StandardBounties.issueAndActivateBounty (/unique_chucks/2/0x2af47a65da8cd66729b4209c22017d6a5c2d2400.sol#333-367):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(tokenContracts[bounties.length].transferFrom(msg.sender,this,_value)) (/unique_chucks/2/0x2af47a65da8cd66729b4209c22017d6a5c2d2400.sol#349-351)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- bounties (/unique_chucks/2/0x2af47a65da8cd66729b4209c22017d6a5c2d2400.sol#353-364)
HumanStandardToken.version should be constant (/unique_chucks/2/0x2af47a65da8cd66729b4209c22017d6a5c2d2400.sol#105-106)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/2/0x2af47a65da8cd66729b4209c22017d6a5c2d2400.sol#126-137:
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"
StandardToken.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/2/0x2af47a65da8cd66729b4209c22017d6a5c2d2400.sol#74-77) should be declared external
Token.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/2/0x2af47a65da8cd66729b4209c22017d6a5c2d2400.sol#17-19) should be declared external

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/2/0x2af47a65da8cd66729b4209c22017d6a5c2d2400.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/2/0x2af47a65da8cd66729b4209c22017d6a5c2d2400.sol#1): it allows old versions
